content: The best time to visit Bologna depends on your preferences and interests. The city experiences mild weather for most of the year, but summers can be hot and humid. The busiest and most expensive time to visit is typically during the summer months (June to August) when many tourists flock to the city. Spring (March to May) and autumn (September to November) are great times to visit as the weather is mild and crowds are smaller. Winter (December to February) can be chilly and rainy, but it can be a great time to explore the city's indoor attractions and museums. Ultimately, it's best to choose a time that suits you best and fits into your travel budget.
